General.Name: Farcent Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Farcent Enterprise Co.,Ltd provides consumer products and services in Taiwan. The company offers air freshener sprayers; deodorizers; cleaning tools, such as mops, kitchen wet wipes, wet cleaning cloths, and dust cloths; dehumidifier; and perfumes, shampoos, shower gels, and diffusers under the Farcent, Ms. Bright, LPF, CHU, and HI TEA brands. The company was formerly known as Eutech Enterprise Co., Ltd and changed its name to Farcent Enterprise Co., Ltd in 1996. Farcent Enterprise Co., Ltd was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.230, Sec.3, Chengde Rd., Taipei, Taiwan, 103
